top_articles.title: Apple Patches iOS Zero-Day Exploited in ‘Extremely Sophisticated Attack’
top_articles.summary: Impacting the ‘dyld’ system component, the memory corruption issue can be exploited for arbitrary code execution.

top_articles.title: Apple fixes zero-day flaw used in 'extremely sophisticated' attacks
top_articles.summary: Apple has released security updates to fix a zero-day vulnerability that was exploited in an "extremely sophisticated attack" targeting specific individuals.
